meaningMnemonic: This <radical>thread</radical> is <radical>odd</radical>, but that's what makes it <kanji>beautiful</kanji>. It's a little frayed, it's a little miscolored, but that's what makes it appealing to you.
readingMnemonic: You take this <kanji>beautiful</kanji> thread and lock it up with a <reading>key</reading> (き). You want to keep it all to yourself, you want its beauty to be for your eyes only!
